desc: Bay Street Manufacturing, under the HealthGuardTM brand, manufactures and distributes innovative medically graded top of bed protection products aimed at reducing the suffering of individuals affected by allergies and other asthmatic problems and increasing sleep comfort.

layout.text: Crafting quality pillows and mattress protectors since 1991

HealthGuard™, the trusted name in top of bed accessories. Shielding your mattress/box spring and pillow from dust mites, allergens, liquids and bed bugs. Also offering a full range of pillows to satisfy any type of sleeper.
